Topic: Draw a fish in their habitat with labels.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a fish in its natural habitat, such as a lake, river, pond, or ocean.
The student can clearly label the fish and other animals or plants found in the same habitat.
The student can show and label the resources the fish needs to survive, like water and food.
The student can represent how the different elements of the habitat work together as a system to support the fish and other living things.
The student can illustrate and label how the fish depends on its environment and how the environment provides for its needs.
